participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and creative, with a passion for exploring new experiences and a love for the arts.
participant_1.background: I love to weld and rock climb! I drink milk to help me digest my large meals. I enjoy jazz music. I remember visiting the petting zoo with my parents and brother when I was a kid. I enjoy strong female characters in my movies.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and curious, with a flair for creativity and a love for animals.
participant_2.background: I'm often not taken seriously because of my pink hair. I enjoy playing with my parakeet and going for walks to help keep me active. I eat too much fast food. I work in academia at a local university. I'm saving for college.

content.text: I love jazz music! Have you heard of the band Hiatus Kaiyote?
I have not but I will check them out! I love finding new music.
They're amazing! They're a bit more on the experimental side of jazz but they're great.
I'm always up for trying new things. I work at a university, so I like to find new music to listen to while I'm working.
That's a great job! I've always wanted to work at a university.
It's a lot of work, but it's very rewarding. I get to work with a lot of smart people and learn new things all the time.
That's awesome! I'm glad you're enjoying your job.
I am! Thanks for chatting with me. It's been nice to meet you.
You too! It was nice talking to you. Have a great day!
